Html:
I have installed Kigg2.2 on a Vista Machine, running IIS7 and VS 2008 .Net 3.5, MS SQL 2005

Everything seems to be working fine, exept publising new stories.

After clicking the submit tag, all text boxes filled in correctly, I get a 404 errorpage. THe address bar has the new story uri (extentionless) in it.

as in : http://localhost/KiGG/Kigg/ASPNET-MVC-2-Preview-1-is-released-Gunnar-Peipmans-ASPNET-blog

This happens whether I am loged in as admin or normal user.

Strange thing is that the story is submitted, waiting for approval.

I can view the story, loged in as admin and go to Unapproved in the control panel.

 

THanks

You'll need to edit your web.config.

Find http://localhost/kigg and replace it with http://localhost
Thanks mosessaur, That seemed to do the trick
